trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IConnectionPoint`在 MSDN library 的 com 子資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Establishes an advisory connection between the connection point and the caller's sink object.
trans-unit.target: 諮詢之間建立連接的連接點和呼叫端的接收物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Advise` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IConnectionPoint::Advise`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: Reference to the sink to receive calls for the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
trans-unit.target: 接收此連接點所管理的輸出介面呼叫的參考。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, contains the connection cookie.
trans-unit.target: 成功傳回時，會包含連接 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Creates an enumerator object for iteration through the connections that exist to this connection point.
trans-unit.target: 建立存在此連接點的連線中反覆運算的列舉值物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::EnumConnections` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IConnectionPoint::EnumConnections`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, contains the newly created enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 成功傳回時，會包含新建立的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此連接點所管理之輸出介面的 IID。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionInterface` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionInterface`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, contains the IID of the outgoing interface managed by this connection point.
trans-unit.target: 成功傳回時，會包含此連接點所管理之輸出介面的 IID。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPointContainer" name="IConnectionPointContainer" href=""></xref> interface pointer to the connectable object that conceptually owns this connection point.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPointContainer" name="IConnectionPointContainer" href=""></xref>在概念上擁有這個連接點可連接物件的介面指標。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionPointContainer` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IConnectionPoint::GetConnectionPointContainer`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, contains the connectable object's <xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPointContainer" name="IConnectionPointContainer" href=""></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在成功傳回時，包含可連接物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_IConnectionPointContainer" name="IConnectionPointContainer" href=""></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Terminates an advisory connection previously established through <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint.Advise%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 終止透過先前建立諮詢連接<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint.Advise%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IConnectionPoint::Unadvise` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱現有的文件`IConnectionPoint::Unadvise`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: The connection cookie previously returned from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMIConnectionPoint.Advise%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
